website_summaries.verdict: No need to spray Frebreze in the cat room anymore. This pleasantly-scented litter clumps like a dream, and it's affordable too.
pros: The Frebreze smell is subtle, but effective
Extra fine grains are soft on your cat's paws, and allows clumps to form and harden quickly
Litter produces little to no dust
Litter is divided into multiple 4 pound bags, which each last roughly 1 week in a single cat home
These smaller bags make pouring and storing the litter easier
cons: When litter level is too low, clumps stick to the bottom of the litter box

customer_reviews.title: No more lifting heavy litter boxes!
customer_reviews.text: After having surgery I was put on a lifting restriction of no more than 10 lbs. With 4 cats, lots of litter is used in my home. I ordered this product because it comes with four 8 lbs individual packages so problem solved. Having it delivered by my wonderful UPS driver was fantastic because he will set it inside the door -all I have to do is cut open the wrapper and take the individual packets into the cats' room! I have used Fresh Step for a long time because of it's effectiveness, but now all I have to do is throw away the empty packets in the trash. WONDERFUL PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, the packaging is not!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, the packaging is not! I use this brand all the time. I have 5 cats and nothing works better. The price was so good I thought I would try having it delivered so I didn't have to carry it in and out of the store. It came in a big box. When I opened it, the plastic around the bags had holes in it as well as some of the bags which caused litter to be all in the bottom of the box. Now I have to figure out what I'm going to put the litter in. I'll just buy it at the grocery store or pet store as I always have and avoid the headache!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: This litter is individually wrapped and I LOVE it for what I am using it for
customer_reviews.text: This litter is individually wrapped and I LOVE it for what I am using it for. Whenever I bring my cat to my moms house, he obviously needs a litter box. When I buy a regular box, I use the entire thing in 1-2 days. Such a waste of money. With this, I only need to use 1 pack and it works great for 1-3 days (I have a clear plastic bag in the litter so I dump it - if you cleaned out the litter, it would last longer). Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Loving It!
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying this product after loving it the first time. The febreze smell is the best! Everytime my kitten steps off the litter box she smells great. On top of that it clumps well. What more do you want? Convenient to buy with a great price tag. Out of all the kitty litter I have used this one is by far the best. Don’t miss out cat lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Anisha G

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! I have been using this litter for many years, with great satisfaction, and have even recommended it to many people. Unfortunately, my latest shipment was a disaster. It is so dusty and strong smelling, I thought I had gotten the wrong product. In addition, my cat is making much more of a mess around the house because the litter is much too fine causing it stick to her paws, which it never did before. They have just lost a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Kurdyla

customer_reviews.title: Works As Stated
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an elderly friend, smells better than my Pail litter with Fabreeze. This product is great for persons that have disabilities in a couple of ways; Individual packages weigh under 10 pounds, its compact size leaves a smaller footprint in storage, it can be opened by laying in litter box and simple puncture of the bag, it is in, pails are hard to open and have a large footprint while used and when discarded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Client

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, the dust is enough to clog lungs and the scent of the product is beyond overwhelming. It is like when someone wears an entire bottle of perfume only worse due to the dust. Had to get rid of the product because I didn't want to cause harm to my fur babies. I seriously feel for the employees who work in the plant where this is made. Wonder how many developed lung cancer or other diseases.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient. Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience and easy storage these smaller bags offer. Each one holds exactly the amount of litter I need for each cat box. Although I do use an additional additive to control smell, this litter has worked the best for me when it comes to not noticing the box until it’s time to clean it out. The cats don’t hesitate to use it, either, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: eLLe Tee

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have had my cats for about 5 years now, and I think I can safely say I have used all litters on the market. This is definitely one of the best in terms of low tracking and smell. I appreciate that it clumps well for easy cleaning. I used to use the Tidycats lightweight simply so I could lug it home after purchase, but realized quickly that lightweight = heavy tracking. This is larger rocks, but not too large that my cats don't like it. Pros: Low Tracking Good Smell Good Clumping Good Price Cons: Umm...
customer_reviews.author: Jami ValkosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell and super dusty!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked by how much I dislike this product. There is a strong chemical smell and it is the dustiest litter I’ve used! The smell irritates me even when I’m standing 5ft away, I can’t inagine how my poor cats are putting up with it. I have to cover my face and look away everytime I pour it becuase of how dusty it gets. I’ve never thrown out clean litter before but this stuff is so bad, I just might have to. I am lucky my cats are still going in the litter box despite he strong chemical smell. Does not smell like Febreeze unless it’s Febreeze’s new Chernobyl scent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Diller

customer_reviews.title: Litter, litter everywhere. :-(
customer_reviews.text: My order was delivered today. Shipping box intact. I ordered this product for the convenience of the individual packages of litter. However upon opening the box, l discovered that one package was broken open and litter was everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD LITTER
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this by mistake and I'm very glad I did. My husband brought it in so I didn't realize that there were 4 separate bags of litter in the carton, so I was pleasantly surprised that I didn't have to lift the usual 30 + pounds of litter. Each small bag weighs only about 8 1/2 pounds each so it's so easy now! As for the littler itself it's does the job, clumps hard and has a very light scent. Even though it's a little more expensive than buying the big box I'll continue to get this size.
customer_reviews.author: D. Catellier

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging!!  Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and our cat loves it. It smells fresh! HOWEVER, the packaging of this product is FLAWED. I received a package of four bags and one of the four bags split along the side seam scattering kitty litter all over the shipping box and leaking out of the seam at the bottom of the box. As a result, I purchased four bags but only received three and two thirds packages of litter. If you have a Tidy Cat 35 pound plastic tub, save it and use it to store this product. My UPS delivery man said that the box left a trail of kitty litter in his truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value and product
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the packaging of this Fresh Step cat litter. The four smaller bags are easy to lift and open to pour out and keep the cats area neat and tidy. I usually use one bag per week, scooping as necessary and then replacing all litter after 7 days so this is about one months supply of litter for our household. It does a good job of neutralizing urine odors but nothing I’ve found really helps with number 2 including this product. I have looked around and find this to be a good value for a litter that works well and that the cat likes (he is actually picky about the texture in his box).
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY CAT LITTER
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY cat litter I will use. I don't care what any other brand says (and YES, I have tried them ALL!) this is the only one that TRULY clumps cat pee. The others get sticky and mushy, or they don't clump and fall apart into bits of yuck. This cat litter consistently clumps well, is easy to scoop, and covers the dreadful smell of cat pee better than any other litter. It is a little pricier than the other but SO WORTH IT. And buying this larger sized carton of it makes up for the cost. Definitely the BEST Litter.
customer_reviews.author: Bookapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Minimal But Pleasant Scent; Easy to Use; Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, arrived with no issues, and the scent is MINIMAL yet pleasant. The litter is parceled into four bags which are shrink wrapped together in one main package. Each smaller bag is easy to move (around 8.5 pounds each) and easy to open (no scissors or Samurai sword needed to get inside). Also, it must taste great because my MIL's dog makes a snack run on kitten crunchies every time he visits.
customer_reviews.author: I Like Ike

customer_reviews.title: People are always shocked to find out we own cats, much less 3 of them.  Keeps your litter box odor free.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand of cat litter on the market and I have literally tried every brand on the market. My mom always bought this brand. Which meant I had to find one that was different. I keep coming back to this brand as it keeps the smell away, and works like you want it to. People are always shocked we own cats as I have been told multiple times that they have never smelled a littler box in my house. Which tells me this litter is doing it's job.
customer_reviews.author: AngB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy when you have lots of cats!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best litter we've found for our 8 cats. We've tried all of them for "multi-cats" and this was far superior. It clumps the best making the box much easier to clean, and it doesn't have the "dust" when you pour in new litter. This type of packaging is fantastic. I did a price comparison and this was a great value. So great that we "stocked up" and bought 10 packages!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Brock

customer_reviews.title: Watch the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: individually packaged Warning: If you're a cat owner like me, chances are you'll buy litter more than once and stick to the same brand. The first time I bought this, it was $17. After, I would often would "buy it again." It wasn't until recently I noticed that I have purchased the same thing from the same vendor ranging from $17 to $33. So BE MINDFUL! Don't get tricked and check the price every time you buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats and old people!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats have always used Fresh Step. Why? Because it helps reduce odor and clumps well and as a bonus it's almost dust free and our cats prefer it over those cheaper brands. And now to top it off the four pound bags are great for two seniors in their 70's. When it's delivered the mail person sets it on a 4 wheel cart and we roll it to a storage area and open up and still be able to lift the bags with ease even with arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Doug & Jean

customer_reviews.title: Full of dust and quality control is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: I have used fresh step for years, but have noticed on multiple occasions that their quality control is lacking. The product varies from low dust to nothing but dust. It still clumps effectively for the most part, but I've had to place an air filter in the area near the litter box to hopefully mitigate some of the dust cloud that appears, every time the box is used.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: You Can't beat the Price and 2nd floor door delivery
customer_reviews.text: I or should I say my cat Schmeg prefers fresh Step. When they came out with this 4 pack, it is perfect for 1 pack per week. Exactly, a 1 months supply of fresh liter at a cost I can afford while not injuring my back. By no means should you interpret this as cleaning his box weekly....I replenish as needed from the 4 pre-measured bags I get from amazon which is cost effective by price and not pouring out to much from a big heavy 25lb box of litter.
customer_reviews.author: Schmeg

customer_reviews.title: Best litter I've used in over 10 years
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched from tidy cats brand to this brand. I did not like that tidy cats did not clump well and made it difficult to effectively scoop and clean, and their lightweight version just increased tracking all over the home. With this brand the odors are minimized better in comparison, there is hardly any dust, and the best part is the clumping really is very effective and makes cleaning so much better. I highly recommend this brand of litter.
customer_reviews.author: Baba Yaga

customer_reviews.title: Good Concept
customer_reviews.text: So I get the idea of having four smaller bags versus one large box, but you still have to carry the package into your home and it's pretty darn heavy. But after you put it away and grab one small bag it does take up less space and is easier to pour from. The cat liter is no different than any other Fresh Step you may be used to. My cat likes it. I like it. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan1117

customer_reviews.title: The best litter
customer_reviews.text: This litter clumps so well and it doesn’t track around the house much. It’s heavy weight and I think that’s why it doesn’t track. I wasn’t a fan of how small these bags are though, why not just a large bag/box instead of 4 small ones? Definitely recommend the litter though. Works great for multi-cat households. (I have 3 kitties)
customer_reviews.author: Layla Simons

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Litter
customer_reviews.text: Fresh Step is definitely the best cat litter to keep the smell to a minimum and is easy to clean, believe me I’ve tried them all over the years. It’s a bit on the pricey side but worth every penny. I also love the convince of the 4 small bags. This seller was great too. Reasonable price and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.author: Colorado88

customer_reviews.title: The best kitty litter to hide your kitty litter box
customer_reviews.text: This is the type of kitty litter I’ve settled on because it clumps around stuff so you don’t smell a thing. You’d never know it was there. I clean it out often, but I have gone six days before and it still doesn’t make that room smell. You do need to replace it as it clumps around the waste, but that’s just common sense. Who wants a bunch of used litter anyway? It does create more dust than others, so I pour it outside. I like the individual bags like this. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Sequeira

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in 4 small bags which makes it easier to pour. I have a big litter box (booda xl) so I had to open three of the bags to fill it... Felt like a waste of packaging. I definitely recommend for smaller boxes but it was the cheapest price in comparison to other deals so I'm not complaining. The scent wasn't overpowering and it clumps nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Do you have back issues when bending over to change out the litter box? For years I have struggled lifting those huge boxes of litter and trying to pour them in! Well, look no further! This Fresh Step Litter in convenient bags is the answer! I tried it for the first time and I loved it! Each bag is portioned out with just the right amount of litter. It smells nice and is not dusty. My cat likes it. Best of all, I don’t put my back out lugging around huge boxes of litter!
customer_reviews.author: linda s.Furumoto

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: This cat litter works really well at keeping the scent at bay and easy to clean up each and every day. I did not notice any dust flying when I was adding the cat litter like a lot of cat litter does. It lasted for about a month with 1 cat and making sure it was clean each and every day. It clumps really well so it was so easy cleaning it each day.
customer_reviews.author: DazzlingMystic

customer_reviews.title: A heavy perfume smell.
customer_reviews.text: I broke my ankle and can't go down the basement steps to scoop the litter boxes, so I set up a litter box in my first floor bathroom. Also, Amazon delivers this to my front door so I don't have to go out and buy it and struggle to get it (34 pounds) from the car to the front door. At first the cats wouldn't go near it, but must have decided this was more convenient than running down the basement. One cat decided he would rather pee in the bathtub than on this litter, but eventually he came around.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky

customer_reviews.title: 10days fresh & LOW DUST
customer_reviews.text: I know it's supposed to be 7 days, but we've been able to just sift daily w sifting bags. I am not a cat person, have a very senstive nose & severe asthma. I must say we haven't noticed the litter box. The litter has a clean smell even when we dumped it after 10days. Even then it smelled fresh. I apericated the low dust too!
customer_reviews.author: V Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Heavy Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Since cat litter is very heavy I thought it would be a great idea to have it delivered to my door but when deleivered it was through mail so i have to lug it from mail area into car and then in my condo. WOW, what a project! I wish they would sent it fed or ups. Thats why I gave it a one star.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. GG

customer_reviews.title: Whoa!  Extremely scented!
customer_reviews.text: This litter is great for how it works, but it is a VERY strong scent. Kitty’s seemed ok with it, but not sure it’s healthy for them. For me, personally, the scent permeated my whole house and was way too strong to live with. I changed over to their unscented and it’s a much better fit for my household.
customer_reviews.author: SuziB686

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used his product for several years and have always done my shopping at a local pet store. Advancing age now prohibits me from continuing, then I found it on Amazon! It now comes to my door packaged in individual application packs which makes it much easier to handle. No big heavy box. The product is consistently good and there is no odor to contend with. I will continue with this method of purchase as it is so-o much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Doflicker

customer_reviews.title: Poor odor control
customer_reviews.text: I like the packaing. The 34lb cat litter is grouped into 4 separate bags. This old person could bring them into one bag at a time instead of the spine-crushing 34 pounds of cat litter altogether. However, the cat litter isn't effective at odor control. Not even one day. Can't smell the Febreze whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: F. C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: At first, I didn’t know what to think, but these are wonderful. They come in mini bags and are fantastic for changing the cat box. I’ve had spine surgeries and about to have another and am unable to lift them, so this is helpful for me to have on hand in smaller bags to use in changing the box. Cats love this stuff and living in a small NYC apartment, it’s the only thing that keeps the smell down.
customer_reviews.author: Justagirlinnyc

customer_reviews.title: BEST LITTER EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, this is the very best cat litter ever, especially when u have 7 kitty cats and 3 huge litter boxes to clean.. This litter is so good that when we have company over or the random repair man comes they don't realize we have so many cats. This product eliminates the stink of thier waste so good that sometimes you/we think they haven't gone to the potty at all but to our surprise they have. love this litter.
customer_reviews.author: sweet thing 1

customer_reviews.title: Changed hands too many times
customer_reviews.text: Tried this online order twice and both times, it came spoiled in flavor and flat. from changes in temp (like beer) I put in my fridge right away, but it is flat, taste nasty and wasted funds. Must have changed hands too many times. Where I will go to Costco directly to avoid this happening.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Miller

customer_reviews.title: This litter introduces you to the need for a Chisel and hammer.
customer_reviews.text: I completed a 40 pound bag of Fresh Step Extreme cat litte with activated charcoal. I saw this product and thought it was the same thing. I was WRONG! When used, this littler make impenetrable clumps of concrete. I never knew what they meant on the TV commercials with a chisel and a hammer to remove cat litter. Now I DO!! How can two products be so dissimilar.? The odor control is acceptable, the tractability, clumping is not.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne King

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I keep coming back to this litter after trying various other litters that claim to do what this one does. They all fail, but this one works and smells great. No one smells the litter box when they visit and I have it on the porch that everyone walks into to enter the house. Now to find a way to hide the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: short-n-sweet

customer_reviews.title: So easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Fresh Step in my cats litter boxes for over 15 years now. But this new 4-pack is the best way to buy litter. I have a multi level home with litter boxes on each level and it's so easy to grab a little 7 pound bag and take it upstairs instead of trying to lug a 35 pound box up the stairs! It is so convenient, but it's getting increasingly difficult to find this product in its 4-pack form. I hope Fresh Step doesn't discontinue this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Boyum

customer_reviews.title: a good product
customer_reviews.text: a good product, but it's way too expensive for my budget. It almost completely eliminates odors from a box even if it's uncleaned for a day or two. It absorbs effectively, but seems exceptionally heavy after doing so (compared to other brands used). It is really really nice that there is no dust from using this. That and odor control are my favorite things about this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great cat litter
customer_reviews.text: The litter is not a fine sand type of litter but does clump well and scoops easily. The Febreze smell is nice and there is no dust that I see like you have in some litters. The resealable bag is not really resealable, it just has a big sticker that you put on the open end, but the individual bags are not really big and I have just used the entire bag at once. I will definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: vcraig

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Step clumpable litter is the only one I will use!
customer_reviews.text: I have tryed them all! Have had a cat or cats for 40 years. Fresh Step Clumping litter is the only brand I will purchase. No one ever knows we have cats, no smell in house, easy clumping to clean, less dust than most, cats have never not used box, easy to store, dont feel the need to empty out litter as much. Thank You Amazon for carrying this product. Makes my life easier to have it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great cat litter
customer_reviews.text: What's more important is that this is a great idea if you can't lift much or have an injury, or maybe you're elderly, the cat litter is broken up into multiple packs and it's a lot easier to carry and pour into the litter box. I had bought these because I noticed a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Quantity, not quality.  Dusty, stinky.
customer_reviews.text: Long time FRESH STEP user. Lured by convenience of large quantity in 4 separate bags. FS makes a quality product, so I was disappointed when quantity offset quality. Litter need not have a fresh scent, but this formula’s odor control is lacking. The powdery litter dust extends from the box to wherever the cat goes. She smells litter boxy, the basement smells litter boxy. I’m eager to go back to FS regular, I just have to get through all of this bulk order first. P-U!
customer_reviews.author: SilverPenny

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had discovered these years ago. The smaller packs are perfect sized and keep me from over-filling the cat box (which I always do - it never seems like enough 😕) and results in less spillage. This is the only way to go! It's good quality litter, competitively priced, delivered right to my door. What's not to like? Highly recommend to other cat owners.
customer_reviews.author: Frozen_Lizard

customer_reviews.title: No More Lugging Heavy Litter Buckets Home
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I live in San Francisco, and only do I not have to try to lug home cat litter from the store once every two weeks, this comes in four smaller bags that are easier to stow away. This litter brand is great. My room doesn’t small at all like a cat box, and it clumps well for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: coltonredwine

customer_reviews.title: There are a couple things that I don't like. 1
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cat litter for a while now. There are a couple things that I don't like. 1. Litter does not lessen the bad odor from my cat's defecation. 2. The litter is everywhere around the litter box so I have to clean not only the litter box but also the floor around it. Maybe I will try some other cat litter products next time. smh...
customer_reviews.author: Cyka

customer_reviews.title: No longer singing the Smelly Cat song.
customer_reviews.text: We already had one cat and rescued an adult cat a couple of months ago. All of a sudden we noticed the smell around the litter box was so strong and we are cleaning out the box 2x a day. Over a two month period, we tried out about 6 different types of litter. Finally hit gold with Fresh Step w/Fabreze. Not only is the area around the litter box free from foul order, but the cats are no longer trying to push the litter outside the box as that was getting messy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Helps keep the smell away. Especially if I mix in some baking soda. I clean out multiple times a day, haven’t had any issues and no complaints. My go-to litter. I like the individual packs very much. I don’t have to lug around heavy litter, I use one whole bag per litter box - which is different than the directions say to use I believe, but it works best for me. I have big cats.
customer_reviews.author: Wormwoodwombat

customer_reviews.title: Usually, I dont have a problem
customer_reviews.text: I order this litter regularly. What I love about the product is that I am able to lift the individual bags. This time though, I opened the outside shrink wrap and picked up a bag and it went EVERYWHERE! It was split open at the back seam (I used my hands to tear open the shrink wrap, or I would have though I must of slashed it) not sure if I should keep getting it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This litter is the last one we will ever buy! We have searched long and hard for a good litter that traps in odors, this is it. You can walk right next to the litter box ,even when it has been recently used, and you would never know a litter box is even there. It is not too dusty and clean up is a breeze. I love the packaging too. It makes it convenient to change out the litter without picking up a heavy tub or using a scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I dislike lugging around the heavy box of cat litter. These packages are so much easier to handle! You can open the delivery box, slice open the outer packaging and just carry each bag to where you want to store them. Still the same great Fresh Step but no giant bulky box hanging around...just use one bag to fill or refill litter box. I would definitely recommend these to anyone who is challenged by lifting a big box of cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: KHalliday

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, Effective, and Smells Great Too
customer_reviews.text: Although I only have one cat, he uses the bathroom enough for two sometimes therefore this product is excellent in providing a clean environment where my cat can do his business without leaving unpleasant odors. The convenient four pack design makes for ensuring the perfect amount of litter is placed into the litter pan after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Best way to get your cat litter!
customer_reviews.text: You have a cat -- you need kitty litter! I got so sick of breaking my back, pouring fresh litter into my cat's box from those large boxes (23-28 lbs), so I decided to give this a try. I will NEVER go back to buying the big boxes again! This comes in four packs of 8 pounds each - so easy to use - and it arrives at your door (or mailbox)! the price is very reasonable also. Thank you Amazon Prime!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keltie

customer_reviews.title: I love the smaller bags.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Fresh Step litter for years..I have three cats and it works well but I disliked hauling around 20-25 pound boxes. The 34 pounds is this package comes in four packages so its only 8 1/2 pounds at a time. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kurt Olmosk

customer_reviews.title: try to against about Plastic in general.
customer_reviews.text: The product is the best Fresh Step for me. I tried many other "5 stars" that are failed to my expectation. Of course, women like me is very hard time to handle to lift up the big box. this one is very easy, divided each. very easy to carry. The thing is more using wrapping up plastics. and I feel very guilty. I have 4 cats. they are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Meow

customer_reviews.title: Best of our options
customer_reviews.text: This litter works the best of what I have tried over the last 10 years I’ve had my cat. The four separate bags are extremely convenient- won’t kill your back! The dust cloud does in fact occur when using but I’ve accepted that as an inevitability. Smells good and no bad reactions from my cat. I do have to use 1.5 bags to fill my box sufficiently- but my box is large as my cat is about 15 lbs
customer_reviews.author: KandS A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value when you can get it at a descent price
customer_reviews.text: I always want to set up automatic shipments with this, but refuse to do it when the price changes every time I order it. That is a little ridiculous, especially for someone who purchases this at least once a month. Other than that, this litter is the best litter and at a great price (when it's at $17 or below).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fassbender

customer_reviews.title: Nope; no thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've had and used the product, I would not buy it again. There is a fine powder residue which the cat tracks out of the box and spreads through the room. Daily mopping the residue up Is frustrating. No more.
customer_reviews.author: Gram D

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality as the boxes
customer_reviews.text: So it's definitely easier to manage little itty bitty packets of litter but the quality is so different than buying it in the box. It was harder to clean and the litter box smelled horrible when using this. I still use Fresh Steo but I buy it in the boxes only now
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fage

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This litter is a game changer for sure! I can’t believe I didn’t know about it sooner. I used Tidy Cats for years because I simply thought it was the best available. Now I know better! This stuff clumps like you wouldn’t believe. Where Tidy Cats would crumble dirty pee litter into the box when I scooped, Fresh Step scoops clean and lasts so much longer. Never going back!!!
customer_reviews.author: thriftykittyterrehaute

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Step Cat Litter w/ Scent
customer_reviews.text: Fresh Step Multi Cat Litter Scent is works great for what I need for. I always coat the bottom of the litterbox with Arm&Hammer Baking Soda with a scent and then add the litter to the litter box. This seems to help with the litter sticking to the bottom . It only last 7 days until it needs to be change.
customer_reviews.author: donna Tursi Massey

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully and nice price
customer_reviews.text: By far the best litter I've personally ever used. Every now and then I get something else that's on sale or has a special and o always regret it. Packaging is easy to open and use, but most importantly the litter controls the smells and clumps nicely and has little tracking...I have 5 cats too so I go through litter quickly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Karla C

customer_reviews.title: Love the Small Packages
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've purchased this item. The small packages make it easier to store than the one large box. The smaller packages are heavy and not the easiest to open, but other than those annoyances, I like this a lot. The scent is nice and my 3 cats made the transition to this well.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are so much easier to use than the 40 lb box. As someone who has chronic back issues and 3 cats (you would be surprised how much they use the litter boxes- sheesh!), this makes it so much easier to manage the not so favorite task of cleaning up. Super convenient! I wish these were on the Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: Great poop sand! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Clumps well and reduces the smell of urine fantastically, even when it's not covered over by more litter. Not the best at covering the smell of my cat's poop but that's most likely due to them being jerks and not fully covering their business. Definitely recommend this kind if you have more than one kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: ok for the person who owns a couple of cats. disappointed in the amount of wasted plastic.
customer_reviews.text: these pre-packaged bundles are great for the cat owner who has just a couple of cats. not so great for those of us who do rescue and need to replenish more often. the plastic is not recyclable so i'm a bit disappointed with the packaging. the only recyclable item is the cardboard tray.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Litter I have used in a while
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that has urinary tract issues and as a result - urinates frequently and in bulk LOL. I have gone through testing so many different cat litters in the past few years. This is granular, but small. Easy to scoop and I LOVE the packaging. I have been very happy with the lack of smell from my cat litter room and this litter in general!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce W.

customer_reviews.title: Great litter-  keeps odor down, but dusty
customer_reviews.text: Lots to love about this litter. Packaging is great- love the (4) 8lb packages. I have two cats and it definitely keeps the odor down which is my biggest concern. It also clumps really well. I would give it five stars but it is quite dusty. Since that’s it’s only draw back I would still highly recommend, especially for multiple cats!
customer_reviews.author: saxcat00

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is so convenient and handy when you are old and can't carry all heavy stuff from the car into the house. 'Ive tried many brands of litter and this I like best. No, NO SMELL. However it is difficult to dispose of cause its heavier when used. Now if Amazon would come take out my trash....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good for odor control, not great on creating hard clumps
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a litter-robot. Even with the longest wait time, the clumps still leave wet smears down the machine. However, it does kill the litterbox odor better than anything else I've used. I mix it with Arm & Hammer Double-Duty, which isn't great with odor control but clumps a little better.
customer_reviews.author: awgoodkitty

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Clumps well. Scent is a bit much for me —my cats always smells like it and I find it annoying. I don’t usually have an issue with scented litter. I’m in a 1br apartment; maybe in a bigger house it wouldn’t be so in-my-face all the time. I forget the previous version of FS I had but I liked it much better.
customer_reviews.author: queenfrost

customer_reviews.title: Jury Still Out
customer_reviews.text: The positive aspect is that the litter is in small individual packages so you don't have to lift heavy bags. The negative is that your cat (if like mine) will go through the small individual packages in a short time. I'm not sure it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Great litter and great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this litter for a long time and was very happy to get it in this packaging and at this price. Sometimes the large boxes are hard to handle and these smaller bags make it easier to pour into the litter box. The litter itself is very hard clumping and easy to scoop and I like the fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lamp

customer_reviews.title: Best litter out there
customer_reviews.text: Best litter out there! Best clumps, best smell (the smell is AMAZING, i would smell it all day, every day if i could!! Lol!), and the BEST at concealing odor. I’ve been using this litter for 4 years and i have NEVER smelled my cats pee or poo! This is my Goldilocks litter! Love it! I would never even think of switching. Multi Cat, Extreme and Odor Sheild Fresh Step are all great.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Package is good, litter is not
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this litter would work as well as the littler I'd been getting in 25 pound packages. The packaging was more convenient, but it quickly became super saturated and sticky and impossible to scoop. Not sure why this formula is so different.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: I ONLY use Fresh Step!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this clumping litter. I have had cats my entire life and this is the ONLY litter that doesn't smell like litter (I hate that smell!) and masks the cat pee/poop odor. I really like the the way this is packages too. The little individual bags are much easier to store and use when replenishing the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this ten stars if I could! Not only does it Actually clump, but I have been completely lost on the marketing of very heavy cat litter sold in large plastic buckets. I try to re-purpose, but how many can I use? In addition to that, we regularly foster, it is difficult to carry 30-40 lbs from room to room for boxes. I absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meyer

customer_reviews.title: So Great
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat and he is huge! So, his poops is huge and very smelly. This product is so good, that I never smell the litter. I clean the litter once a week because I forget it's there. That's how good this product is. I will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Just Order a Box
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good idea. But each pack is 8 lbs- as advertised. But this doesn't remotely fill a litter box- or replace much after its been scooped. Also the individual bags are not recyclable. A big 'ole box is what I'll order next time. (The cat litter itself I do like and is what I normally buy. It's the format of this I don't like.)
customer_reviews.author: JMo

customer_reviews.title: Don't flush your money down the toilet
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I buy this along with a cheap one (like Tidy Cats which is like $6 for 35lbs). A couple cups of this mixed into the cheap stuff works the same as if you used all Fresh Step, can add a scoop, after cleanings and eventually change the whole tray without wasting the clumpable :)
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It smells good and like how it doesnt have tiny particles flying everwhere while cleaning or chaging. Love the fact that it comes in multiple small packages.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Love the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it comes in 4 packs. I store my litter in a large rolling bin and the packs were easy to use / open. Kept 1 back for emergencies while waiting for re-delivery. Gave it 4 stars because it did not seen to clump as well as others
customer_reviews.author: vicki andrew

customer_reviews.title: Always the best choice
customer_reviews.text: Fresh Step is the ONLY cat litter than knocks out the bad odor that a cat litter can have. These multi pack is so convenient and easy to store, unlike its big boxes or buckets of other products. This comes on 4 individual bags and is great if you have limited storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Carter

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously convenient
customer_reviews.text: This cat litter was as good a quality as any mainstream at this price point. But I love the convenience of the smaller bags I can store them much easier and access my cat litter much more conveniently than when I buy a 40 lb box. I would think these would be perfect if you cannot lift much weight.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: The only litter we use!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every brand of cat litter ever made. I have had cats for 32 years. This is truly the only brand that solidly clumps and makes the stench of a cat BM dissapear. I clean my boxes (3 boxes, 3 cats) 3 times each week. If you didn't see the cats, you would never know we had them. Our home never smells like cat box.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Gormley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I usually get scoop away. And I bought this one because it also comes in four 9.5 pound bags which I find very convenient. This actually works better than the scoop away. There’s less order, more clumping, and the house does not smell at all. I’m actually very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Diva2001a

customer_reviews.title: Multiple bags makes for easy distribution
customer_reviews.text: There are 4 individual packs inside that allow you to add just enough to multiple litter boxes in the house - or - to have spares that are sealed and able to put away for later use. Quality litter with a decent scent and good coverage. Perfect for homes with multiple litter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: RUTH

customer_reviews.title: Save all the heavy lifting!  Order from Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.text: Price per pound comparable to Walmart, but don't have to deal with getting it from the shelf to the basket. And then getting it into the house. The four individual packages are easy to handle when cleaning the litter box. Have been using this same litter for several months, although this is the first time I ordered from Amazon. (Much more convenient!) Have two cats, and clean box box every other day. In small bedroom I do not smell what the cats leave behind. :) And dust is minimal. I think you would be happy if you order through Amazon. With "Prime", it was here in a jiffy.
customer_reviews.author: Carl David Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle 8# bags
customer_reviews.text: I use this in our litter robot. Works great! My favorite part is that they are in (4) 8# bags. I can no longer lift the heavy litter containers and this is perfect. I was worried it would be too much of a perfume fragrance but it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: m.s.o.

customer_reviews.title: Individual packages are great
customer_reviews.text: The litter is good, as you would expect. Price was right. I love the individual packages.. must easier than lugging a massage bag of litter around the house. Also they are the right size to use a single package to fill the entire litter
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Buy it - it's the best
customer_reviews.text: Ppl legit ask what litter we use bc it works so well -- I scoop the poo/pee out once or twice a week. It scoops great. Odor is well controlled - way better than most ppl I know with cats 😆
customer_reviews.author: MMurray

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It’s cat litter, not much of a review to write. Does the job, cat knows where to go. Smells bad after a couple days cause there’s cat stuff in there. Better for dust and smell compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel-Alia Elbaz

customer_reviews.title: Second favorite litter brand
customer_reviews.text: One of my trusted litter brands. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, as it's my #2 brand. My #1 favorite is scoop away. This litter is great but doesn't do as good of a job at masking urine odors as scoop away does. But overall it is my second favorite litter. Clumps great!
customer_reviews.author: Susy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! The only problem I had with it is it wasn't as much litter as I thought it was going to be. This is the best cat litter we have ever found and will definitely stick with it. You never smell anything except febreeze especially when their covering their own mess. It works for 2 cats perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christina McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Perfect package wonderful idea!
customer_reviews.text: I’m disabled I can not lift anything heavy having these small bags are a God send I have everything put at table height even my cats litter boxes are waist high bending is not possible so I have family member poor the litter in smaller bags for me to handle now I have these they unpack the bags so I’m very much thankful!
customer_reviews.author: SeleBlue

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal on cat litter. I have been going to Walmart forever but now, I will only order this litter for cats because it's a bargain compared to anywhere else!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

product_meta.title: Fresh Step Multi-Cat with Febreze Freshness, Clumping Cat Litter
product_meta.description: Size:34lb| Style:Multi-CatFresh Step Multi-Cat Clumping Cat Litter is powerful for even the busiest litter boxes. The litter contains carbon to eliminate and trap odors around the clock. The high quality, clumping clay quickly absorbs liquids and traps odors, forming tight clumps leaving virtually no stinky crumbles after scooping, making cleaning fast and easy. The paw activated fragrance is released every time your cats use the litter box, providing odor control as needed without being overpowering. The four compact, convenient, resealable packs make litter easy to carry, pour and store. To refresh and maintain your litter box, every time you scoop just add more Fresh Step scented cat litter.
feature_bullets: MULTI-CAT CLUMPING LITTER: Fight litter box odors with the strength of Fresh Step Litter partnered with the power of Febreze in our easy to scoop, clumping clay cat litter in a clean, Fresh Scent
ODOR CONTROL CAT LITTER: Specially formulated for multi-cat litter boxes, this cat litter has a 10-day odor control guarantee with activated charcoal that traps and eliminates kitty litter odor
LOW DUST LITTER: For cleaner surfaces and clearer air, we developed a low dust formula with paw activated fragrance that’s released every time your cats use the litter box

SCOOPABLE KITTY LITTER: Make cleaning easy with the four compact, convenient, resealable packs that make litter easy to carry, pour and store and ClumpLock technology forms tight clumps. Four 8.5 lb compact bags of litter equal one 34 lb bag
FRESH STEP CAT LITTER: Made for multi-cat homes and busy litter boxes, this scented Fresh Step scoopable cat litter is created with your cats health and happiness in mind

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
